title: Speakers
description: We will be revealing our amazing speakers soon!

allPeople.title: Chief Guest
allPeople.description: Hear from our esteemed Chief Guest

people.title: Shri Sanjay Kumar Das
people.content: Shri Sanjay Kumar Das is a National Cyber Security Scholar, Certified Cybersecurity Governance Professional, Certified Cybersecurity Strategist; Joint Secretary, IT&E Department and State Information Security Officer, West Bengal, India.
people.tagLine: Joint Secretary, Department of IT&E and State Information Security Officer, West Bengal, India.

allPeople.title: Guest of Honour
allPeople.description: Hear from our esteemed Guest of Honour

people.title: Shri Debashis Sen
people.content: Shri Debashis Sen is an Alumni of Ecole Nationale d'Administration, France, IAS officer (1985 batch, now on contract, former ACS). He is also an experienced administrator with a demonstrated history of working in senior government positions. Skilled in Policy Formulation, Governance, Smart Cities, Information Technology Policy, Start Up Policy, Strategic Planning, and Public Administration. Strong professional expertise in city development, urban analysis and democracy. Trained at Harvard Business School and IMF Institute.

allPeople.title: Extended Events Speakers
allPeople.description: Here are our great speakers at our extended events

people.title: Imran Roshan
people.content: Your Security Sherpa | GDE - GCP | Cyber Security Professional | CCNA, CEH, GC PCSE| Deloitte TTL

people.title: Ritwik Raha
people.content: Machine Learning Engineer @PyImageSearch | GDE in ML
